projects.title: Fitcoin
projects.description:
Fitcoin® is a burn-to-earn fitness app that merges blockchain with real-time activity tracking to reward users with NFTs and ERC-20 tokens.
I led the integration of live fitness data, timezone-specific leaderboards, blockchain contract listeners, and secure Web3 features.
The result is a fully responsive, cross-platform app that delivers gamified challenges, midnight rewards, and a transparent fitness experience.

projects.title: Haggle AI
projects.description:
Haggle is an AI-powered B2B2C negotiation engine for e-commerce, built with advanced NLP, dynamic pricing algorithms, and seamless integrations with Shopify, Stripe, and WooCommerce.
I contributed to building the negotiation bot logic, merchant rule engine, analytics dashboard, and secure encrypted transaction flow with scalable SaaS architecture.
The platform enables personalized pricing, automated upsell/cross-sell, real-time insights, and high-conversion negotiation experiences that boost revenue and reduce cart abandonment.

projects.title: Trofi App
projects.description: A restaurant discovery and mapping application helping users find the best local dining experiences with personalized recommendations.

projects.title: EatEasy
projects.description:
Eateasy is a full-stack restaurant ordering platform offering real-time menu management, dynamic dish updates, and secure payment integrations through Paymob and Stripe.
The system features a powerful admin panel for managing restaurants, menus, orders, inventory, and customer interactions with complete CRUD operations.
Real-time rider tracking, live order status updates, and map-based navigation are enabled through Firebase/Firestore, Node.js/Express, WebSockets, and React/Next.js for a seamless delivery experience.

projects.title: Personality Pixie
projects.description:
Personality Pixie analyzes users’ social media posts, comments, and interactions to generate deep personality insights using advanced LLMs.
The system securely aggregates multi-platform activity and applies NLP-driven behavioral profiling to identify traits, patterns, and communication styles.
A clean dashboard presents sentiment, personality types, social tone, and engagement patterns, helping users understand and improve their digital identity.

Going Gone is a fully modernized online auction platform supporting competitive, sealed, cumulative, and buy-now bidding with deep customization for organizations.
The platform was revamped with a redesigned MongoDB schema, a Nest.js backend, and a high-performance Next.js 14 customer interface alongside a React-based admin portal.
Enhanced features include VMS item imports, Stripe-based organizational payments, PIN authentication, SendGrid/Twilio communication tools, audit logs, and optimized performance for a seamless auction experience.
projects.title: Going Gone

Mentored junior developers and established code quality standards.

experiences.description: Researched and implemented computer vision models for industrial automation.

Optimized model inference time by 3x using TensorRT.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deploy models to edge devices.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
